mapper.select: select pi_id, u_user_id, pi_birthday, pi_sex, pi_nation, pi_politics_status, pi_birthplace, pi_isAgricultural, pi_address, pi_contacts, pi_ID_card_No, pi_specialty, pi_frist_education, pi_other_education, pi_schoolTag, pi_graduation_date, pi_work_type, pi_clothes_size, pi_shoes_size, pi_prentice, pi_credentials, pi_honor, pi_paper, pi_extattr1, pi_extattr2, pi_extattr3 from jckc.kc_personal_info where pi_id = #{piId}

select pi_id, u_user_id, pi_birthday, pi_sex, pi_nation, pi_politics_status, pi_birthplace, pi_isAgricultural, pi_address, pi_contacts, pi_ID_card_No, pi_specialty, pi_frist_education, pi_other_education, pi_schoolTag, pi_graduation_date, pi_work_type, pi_clothes_size, pi_shoes_size, pi_prentice, pi_credentials, pi_honor, pi_paper, pi_extattr1, pi_extattr2, pi_extattr3 from jckc.kc_personal_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into jckc.kc_personal_info(u_user_id, pi_birthday, pi_sex, pi_nation, pi_politics_status, pi_birthplace, pi_isAgricultural, pi_address, pi_contacts, pi_ID_card_No, pi_specialty, pi_frist_education, pi_other_education, pi_schoolTag, pi_graduation_date, pi_work_type, pi_clothes_size, pi_shoes_size, pi_prentice, pi_credentials, pi_honor, pi_paper, pi_extattr1, pi_extattr2, pi_extattr3) values (#{uUserId}, #{piBirthday}, #{piSex}, #{piNation}, #{piPoliticsStatus}, #{piBirthplace}, #{piIsagricultural}, #{piAddress}, #{piContacts}, #{piIdCardNo}, #{piSpecialty}, #{piFristEducation}, #{piOtherEducation}, #{piSchooltag}, #{piGraduationDate}, #{piWorkType}, #{piClothesSize}, #{piShoesSize}, #{piPrentice}, #{piCredentials}, #{piHonor}, #{piPaper}, #{piExtattr1}, #{piExtattr2}, #{piExtattr3})
mapper.update:
update jckc.kc_personal_info
u_user_id = #{uUserId},
pi_birthday = #{piBirthday},
pi_sex = #{piSex},
pi_nation = #{piNation},
pi_politics_status = #{piPoliticsStatus},
pi_birthplace = #{piBirthplace},
pi_isAgricultural = #{piIsagricultural},
pi_address = #{piAddress},
pi_contacts = #{piContacts},
pi_ID_card_No = #{piIdCardNo},
pi_specialty = #{piSpecialty},
pi_frist_education = #{piFristEducation},
pi_other_education = #{piOtherEducation},
pi_schoolTag = #{piSchooltag},
pi_graduation_date = #{piGraduationDate},
pi_work_type = #{piWorkType},
pi_clothes_size = #{piClothesSize},
pi_shoes_size = #{piShoesSize},
pi_prentice = #{piPrentice},
pi_credentials = #{piCredentials},
pi_honor = #{piHonor},
pi_paper = #{piPaper},
pi_extattr1 = #{piExtattr1},
pi_extattr2 = #{piExtattr2},
pi_extattr3 = #{piExtattr3},
where pi_id = #{piId}
